entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3 except temperature steady near zero along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low zero.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1 except high plus 5 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Periods of drizzle beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1 except high plus 5 inland. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 24 April 2023
